sources.title: Bonanza The Last Viking (1960) Full Length Western
sources.description:
Hoss's uncle Gunnar (Neville Brand) turns out to be the leader of a vicious band of outlaws called the Commancheros that kidnaps Little Joe and his girlfriend.
 
Director: John Florea 
Writer: Anthony Lawrence
Stars: Dan Blocker, Michael Landon, Lorne Greene 
Genres: Classics, Cult, TV, Western

sources.title: Bonanza (TV-1960) THE LAST VIKING (S2E10)
sources.description:
This Timeless TV Western starring Lorne Green, Pernell Roberts, Dan Blocker and Michael Landon, is one of the most popular shows in television history!

THE LAST VIKING: Gunnar Borgstrom is the leader of a vicious band called the Commancheros. They burn houses, kill people and steal anything of value. When the Commancheros get to Nevada, Gunnar decides to visit his relatives, the Cartwrights. Meanwhile the gang capture Little Joe and his girlfriend. When Gunnar returns to the gang, he has no idea who Joe is because he'd never met his nephew before.

metadata.Plot: Gunnar is a long-lost relative of the Cartwright family. When Gunnar arrives at the Ponderosa, the family takes him in for the evening. Gunnar is the brother to one of Ben Cartwright's late wives, Inger. Unbeknownst to the Cartwri...
metadata.Writer: Anthony Lawrence, David Dortort, Fred Hamilton
metadata.Actors: Dan Blocker, Michael Landon, Lorne Greene
